faq.title: Worried about rolling out a new platform?

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Most clients are up and running within 2-3 weeks, including training and data migration.

items.question: Do you offer training for our team?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training sessions and ongoing support to ensure your team is confident using the platform.

items.question: Can we integrate with our existing systems?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer integrations with most popular business tools and can create custom integrations if needed.

items.question: What if we need custom features?
items.answer: We work closely with clients to develop custom features that meet their specific inspection requirements.

items.question: Is our data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption, secure data centers, and regular security audits.
